title: Chicken and peach salad
ingredients: ['3 fresh peaches - peeled, stoned and diced', '300g cooked chicken breast, diced', '1 medium cucumber, deseeded and diced', '1/4 to 1/2 red onion, minced', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 pinch caster sugar', '1 handful fresh mint, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
